content: These little enemies are surprisingly durable, and can often come in waves. You'll really need to keep a close eye on them -- if you spot them begin to vibrate rapidly, they'll all explode at once, and getting hit by several exploding spiders can deal a ton of damage if you aren't paying attention.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow'.
The content is as follows:
These little enemies are surprisingly durable, and can often come in waves. You'll really need to keep a close eye on them -- if you spot them begin to vibrate rapidly, they'll all explode at once, and getting hit by several exploding spiders can deal a ton of damage if you aren't paying attention.
